func:
PresenceSensorMsg={
    url:context.global.BlueMixUrlBase+'/red/wink/subscribtions',
    method:"POST",
        headers: {
        "Content-Type":"application/json"
    },
    payload:{
      capabilities: { fields: [ { field: 'presence', type: 'boolean' } ] },
      device_manufacturer: 'node_red_virtual_sensor',
      hidden_at: null,
      last_event: 
       { brightness_occurred_at: null,
         loudness_occurred_at: null,
         vibration_occurred_at: null },
      last_reading: 
       { 
           agent_session_id: 'FALSE',
           connection: true,
           presence:(msg.payload.home=='yes' ? true : false),
       },
      manufacturer_device_model: 'node_red_presence_sensor',
      model_name: 'Presense Sensor',
      "eco_system" : "NODERED",
      name: msg.payload.name,
      object_id: 'Presense_'+msg.payload.name,
      object_type: 'sensor_pod',
      radio_type: 'wifi',
      sensor_pod_id: 'Presense_'+msg.payload.name,
      triggers: [],
      units: {},
      upc_code: 'presence_sensor',
      upc_id: 'Presense_'+msg.payload.name
  }
}

return PresenceSensorMsg;

context.global.clearAllIntervals();
return msg;
rbe
